DOC.brief_summary: This first man study assess safety tolerability IgG cleave enzyme Immunoglobuli G degrade enzyme streptococcus pyogenes ( IdeS ) .
DOC.detailed_description: A phase I study ( 11-HMedIdeS-01 , EudraCT . 2012-000 969-21 ) first man single ascend dose study 29 healthy subject investigate IdeS safe well tolerated dos 0.24 mg/kg body weight ( BW ) .
DOC.criteria: Ability understand sign inform consent BMI 1930 Clinically significant disease Positive HIV , hepatistis B C Drug abuse Smoking Use medication except paracetamol
